core_concept: Quantum entanglement is a mysterious connection between two or more particles that lets them affect each other even when they're really far apart. It's like having a secret language that only they can understand!

key_actors_and_components.name: Entangled Particles
key_actors_and_components.description: The tiny building blocks of matter, such as electrons or photons.

key_actors_and_components.name: Wave Function
key_actors_and_components.description: A mathematical description of the probability of finding a particle in a particular state.

key_actors_and_components.name: Superposition
key_actors_and_components.description: When a particle can exist in multiple states at the same time, like being both spinning and not spinning.

key_actors_and_components.name: Quantum Entanglement Mechanism
key_actors_and_components.description: The process by which entangled particles become connected and start affecting each other.

story_of_process.name: The Mysterious Connection
story_of_process.description: Two or more particles come into contact with each other and become 'entangled'.

story_of_process.name: The Secret Language
story_of_process.description: Entangled particles start to communicate with each other in a way that lets them affect each other's behavior.

story_of_process.name: The Separation
story_of_process.description: The entangled particles are separated by space, but their connection remains.

story_of_process.name: The Influence
story_of_process.description: When something happens to one of the entangled particles, it instantly affects the other particle, no matter how far apart they are.

core_principles.name: Quantum Mechanics
core_principles.description: A branch of physics that studies the behavior of tiny particles and their interactions with energy.

core_principles.name: Non-Locality
core_principles.description: The phenomenon by which two or more particles can be connected in a way that lets them affect each other even when they're far apart.
